html: (2 Nephi 18:9-10)."Associate yourselves, O ye people, and ye shall be broken in pieces." Verses 9 and 10 appear to be a warning that regardless of the alliances that are formed among those of "far countries," regardless of their conspiring ("counsel[ing] together"), their efforts will be unsuccessful ("come to nought"). They will be "broken to pieces" because Judah, the land of Immanuel ("God is with us"), will yet be spared.
